item.title: Job Hunting in Pandemic Times for Junior Engineers
item.description: Original post on E&T Jobs at The Institute of Technology and Engineering, A story of how I got into tech, and what I did to get my first engineering job in tech at the start of the pandemic, in Q & A format with IET’s Charlotte Rogers What sparked your interest in technology? I got into technology because I felt like I was a lazy teache­r. I was teaching a class of 150 students and wanted to make sure that they were making the most of being in the classroom.
